name: Michelle Bowman’s Chopped Salad
instructions: Peel cucumbers lengthwise, cut in half, and de-seed with edge of spoon.
Put garlic cloves into garlic press and mince, Ground peppercorns.
Chop onion, add amount to taste you like.
Combine lettuce, cucumbers, onion and garlic.  Add pepper, toss together.
Combine vinegar and olive oil, toss together.
